alert.note: Alert for Ashe; Watauga (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 02 at 2:36AM EDT until April 02 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...The North Carolina High Country and the Grayson Highlands. * WHEN...Through 4 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Scattered power outages are likely. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are gradually diminishing. The high wind warning will be allowed to expire at 4AM.
info.instruction: Be aware of where you are parking your vehicle and walking to avoid damage or injury from falling trees limbs and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
